_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

OrderResponse.description: A document used to indicate detailed acceptance or rejection of an Order or to make a counter-offer.

OrderResponse.title: Order Response. Details
OrderResponse.description: A document used to indicate detailed acceptance or rejection of an Order or to make a counter-offer.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Order Response. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Order Response. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL.

ProfileID.title: Order Response. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Order Response. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Order Response. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

SalesOrderID.title: Order Response. Sales_ Order Identifier. Identifier
SalesOrderID.description: An identifier for the Order, issued by the Seller.

CopyIndicator.title: Order Response. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Order Response. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Order Response. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Order Response. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

OrderResponseCode.title: Order Response. Order Response Code. Code
OrderResponseCode.description: A code signifying the type of response for this Order.

Note.title: Order Response. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

DocumentCurrencyCode.title: Order Response. Document_ Currency Code. Code
DocumentCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the default currency for this document.

PricingCurrencyCode.title: Order Response. Pricing_ Currency Code. Code
PricingCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the currency that is used for all prices in the Order Response.

TaxCurrencyCode.title: Order Response. Tax_ Currency Code. Code
TaxCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the currency that is used for all tax amounts in the Order Response.

TotalPackagesQuantity.title: Order Response. Total_ Packages Quantity. Quantity
TotalPackagesQuantity.description: The total number of packages contained in the Order Response.

GrossWeightMeasure.title: Order Response. Gross_ Weight. Measure
GrossWeightMeasure.description: The total gross weight for the Order Response (goods + packaging + transport equipment).

NetWeightMeasure.title: Order Response. Net_ Weight. Measure
NetWeightMeasure.description: The total net weight for the Order Response (goods + packaging).

NetNetWeightMeasure.title: Order Response. Net Net_ Weight. Measure
NetNetWeightMeasure.description: The total net weight of the goods in the Order Response excluding packaging.

GrossVolumeMeasure.title: Order Response. Gross_ Volume. Measure
GrossVolumeMeasure.description: The total volume of the goods in the Order Response including packaging.

NetVolumeMeasure.title: Order Response. Net_ Volume. Measure
NetVolumeMeasure.description: The total volume of the goods in the Order Response excluding packaging.

CustomerReference.title: Order Response. Customer_ Reference. Text
CustomerReference.description: A supplementary reference assigned by the buyer, e.g., the CRI in a purchasing card transaction.

AccountingCostCode.title: Order Response. Accounting Cost Code. Code
AccountingCostCode.description: An accounting cost code applied to the order as a whole.

AccountingCost.title: Order Response. Accounting Cost. Text
AccountingCost.description: An accounting cost code applied to the order as a whole, expressed as text.

LineCountNumeric.title: Order Response. Line Count. Numeric
LineCountNumeric.description: The number of Order Lines in this document.

ValidityPeriod.title: Order Response. Validity_ Period. Period
ValidityPeriod.description: The period for which the Order Response is valid.

OrderReference.title: Order Response. Order Reference
OrderReference.description: A reference to the Order being responded to.

OrderDocumentReference.title: Order Response. Order_ Document Reference. Document Reference
OrderDocumentReference.description: A reference to an Order other than the one being responded to.

OrderChangeDocumentReference.title: Order Response. Order Change_ Document Reference. Document Reference
OrderChangeDocumentReference.description: A reference to an Order Change being responded to.

OriginatorDocumentReference.title: Order Response. Originator_ Document Reference. Document Reference
OriginatorDocumentReference.description: A reference to an originator document associated with this document.

AdditionalDocumentReference.title: Order Response. Additional_ Document Reference. Document Reference
AdditionalDocumentReference.description: A reference to an additional document associated with this document.

Contract.title: Order Response. Contract
Contract.description: A contract associated with the Order being responded to.

Signature.title: Order Response. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

SellerSupplierParty.title: Order Response. Seller_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party

BuyerCustomerParty.title: Order Response. Buyer_ Customer Party. Customer Party

OriginatorCustomerParty.title: Order Response. Originator_ Customer Party. Customer Party

FreightForwarderParty.title: Order Response. Freight Forwarder_ Party. Party

AccountingSupplierParty.title: Order Response. Accounting_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party

AccountingCustomerParty.title: Order Response. Accounting_ Customer Party. Customer Party

Delivery.title: Order Response. Delivery
Delivery.description: A delivery associated with this document.

DeliveryTerms.title: Order Response. Delivery Terms
DeliveryTerms.description: A set of delivery terms associated with this document.

PaymentTerms.title: Order Response. Payment Terms
PaymentTerms.description: A set of payment terms associated with this document.

AllowanceCharge.title: Order Response. Allowance Charge
AllowanceCharge.description: A discount or charge that applies to a price component.

TransactionConditions.title: Order Response. Transaction Conditions
TransactionConditions.description: A specification of purchasing or sales conditions applying to the whole Order.

TaxExchangeRate.title: Order Response. Tax_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
TaxExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between the document currency and the tax currency.

PricingExchangeRate.title: Order Response. Pricing_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
PricingExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between the document currency and the pricing currency.

PaymentExchangeRate.title: Order Response. Payment_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
PaymentExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between the document currency and the payment currency.

DestinationCountry.title: Order Response. Destination_ Country. Country
DestinationCountry.description: The country of destination (for customs purposes).

TaxTotal.title: Order Response. Tax Total
TaxTotal.description: The total amount of a specific type of tax, as calculated by the seller.

LegalMonetaryTotal.title: Order Response. Legal_ Monetary Total. Monetary Total
LegalMonetaryTotal.description: The total amount of the Order (or counter-offer).

OrderLine.title: Order Response. Order Line
OrderLine.description: A line associated with a line in the Catalogue and specifying a kind of item being ordered.
